    • Uses of Rule in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.generic

      Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.generic that implement Rule 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotationDataExistenceRule
      This rule verifies that the annotation data is actually present in the Envelope.
      class  AnnotationDataIntegrityRule
      This rule verifies that the annotation data has not been corrupted.
      class  AnnotationsManifestExistenceRule
      This rule verifies that the annotations manifest is actually present in the Envelope.
      class  AnnotationsManifestIntegrityRule
      This rule verifies that the annotmanifest has not been corrupted.
      class  DocumentExistenceRule
      This rule verifies that the tested Document is indeed present in the Envelope.
      class  DocumentIntegrityRule
      This rule verifies that the Document being tested has not been corrupted.
      class  DocumentsManifestExistenceRule
      This rule verifies that the documents manifest is actually present in the Envelope.
      class  DocumentsManifestIntegrityRule
      This rule verifies the validity of the datamanifest which contains records for all Documents associated with a signature.
      class  MultiHashElementIntegrityRule
      Sub-rule that provides DataHash validation for other rules which may need it.
      class  SignatureExistenceRule
      Rule that verifies that there is a signature in the envelope for the given SignatureContent.
      class  SignatureIntegrityRule
      Rule that verifies the EnvelopeSignature of a SignatureContent by using a SignatureVerifier to verify the underlying signature.
      class  SignatureSignsManifestRule
      Rule to verify the input hash of root signature and Manifest.
      class  SingleAnnotationManifestExistenceRule
      This rule verifies the existence of the meta-data file of an annotation.
      class  SingleAnnotationManifestIntegrityRule
      This rule verifies the validity of the manifest file containing meta-data for an annotation.
      class  TrustedHashAlgorithmExistenceRule
      Rule that checks whether there are any DataHashes with HashAlgorithm that have state of HashAlgorithm.status NORMAL.
      class  TrustedHashListIntegrityRule
      Rule that checks whether DataHashes in FileReference match those in EnvelopeElement.
      class  UnimplementedHashAlgorithmExistenceRule
      Rule that checks if there are any DataHashes that use a HashAlgorithm which has state HashAlgorithm.status NOT_IMPLEMENTED,
